name: mental-math-pwa
description: Motivating mental math game for kids

scripts.build:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.apk:debug: npm run build:android && cd android && .\gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.apk:release: npm run build:android && cd android && .\gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.aab:release: npm run build:android && cd android && .\gradlew.bat bundleRelease
